text: Athava svatah tumacyasathi ekhade son'yace ghara asave kinva tumhi akasata cadhuna jave ani amhi tara tumacya cadhuna janyacahi toparyanta visvasa karanara nahi, joparyanta tumhi amacyavara ekhada grantha avatarita karata nahi, jo amhi svatah vacuna ghyava. Tumhi uttara dya ki majha palanakarta motha pavitra ahe. Mi tara eka manava ahe, jo rasula (paigambara) banavuna pathavila gelo ahe
